title: Policy Veto Logic Manifest (PVLM) Schema
description: Schema defining mandatory policy prohibitions (V_Policy) enforced by the GAX Axiomatics Agent (S2 Veto Gate).

veto_rule_id.description: Unique identifier for the specific veto rule.

veto_condition_source.description: Reference to the internal module or external law defining the violation condition.

prohibition_expression.description: Machine-readable logical expression (e.g., DSL or computable code reference) that results in TRUE if the veto is triggered (negation of allowed state).
